00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include <stdlib.h>
00021 #include <mfhdf.h>
00022 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 
00042 MTKt_status MtkFileGridFieldCheck(
00043   const char *filename, 
00044   const char *gridname, 
00045   const char *fieldname  )
00046 {
00047   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00048   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00049   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF-EOS return status */
00050   int32 Fid = FAIL;             /* HDF-EOS File ID */
00051 
00052   if (filename == NULL)
00053     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00054 
00055   /* Open HDF file for reading */
00056   hdfstatus = Fid = GDopen((char*)filename,DFACC_READ);
00057   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00058     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00059 
00060   /* Check if file/grid/field/dimension are valid */
00061   status = MtkFileGridFieldCheckFid(Fid, gridname, fieldname);
00062   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00063 
00064   /* Close file. */
00065   hdfstatus = GDclose(Fid);
00066   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00067     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00068   Fid = FAIL;
00069 
00070   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00071 
00072 ERROR_HANDLE:
00073   if (Fid != FAIL) GDclose(Fid);
00074 
00075   return status_code;
00076 }
00077 
00083 MTKt_status MtkFileGridFieldCheckFid(
00084   int32 Fid,            
00085   const char *gridname, 
00086   const char *fieldname  )
00087 {
00088   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00089   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00090   int nfields;          /* Number fields */
00091   char **fieldlist = NULL;  /* Field list */
00092   int i;            /* Field index */
00093   char *basefield = NULL;   /* Base fieldname */
00094   int nextradims;               /* Number of extra dimensions */
00095   int *extradims = NULL;    /* Extra dimension list */
00096   char **dimlist = NULL;    /* Dimension name list */
00097   int *dimsize = NULL;      /* Dimension size list */
00098   int dimcnt;           /* Number of dimensions */
00099 
00100   if (gridname == NULL || fieldname == NULL)
00101     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00102 
00103   /* Parse fieldname into basefield number of dimensions and size of each dimension */
00104   status = MtkParseFieldname(fieldname, &basefield, &nextradims, &extradims);
00105   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_INVALID_FIELD);
00106 
00107   /* Check if gridname and fieldname are valid (includes derived fields) */
00108   status = MtkFileGridToFieldListFid(Fid, gridname, &nfields, &fieldlist);
00109 
00110   switch (status) {
00111   case MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED: 
00112     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_INVALID_FILE);
00113     break;
00114 
00115   case MTK_HDFEOS_GDATTACH_FAILED:
00116     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_INVALID_GRID);
00117     break;
00118 
00119   case MTK_SUCCESS:
00120     for (i = 0; i < nfields; i++) {
00121       if (strncmp(basefield, fieldlist[i], strlen(fieldlist[i])) == 0)
00122     break;
00123     }
00124     if (i >= nfields) {
00125       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_INVALID_FIELD);
00126     }
00127     break;
00128 
00129   default:
00130     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00131   }
00132 
00133   /* Check if number of dimensions and bounds of each dimension are valid */
00134   status = MtkFileGridFieldToDimListFid(Fid, gridname, fieldname,
00135                     &dimcnt, &dimlist, &dimsize);
00136   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00137 
00138   if (nextradims < dimcnt) {
00139 
00140     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MISSING_FIELD_DIMENSION);
00141 
00142   } else if (nextradims > dimcnt) {
00143 
00144     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_EXTRA_FIELD_DIMENSION);
00145 
00146   }
00147   for (i = 0; i < nextradims; i++) {
00148     if ( extradims[i] < 0 || extradims[i] >= dimsize[i] ) {
00149       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_INVALID_FIELD_DIMENSION);
00150     }
00151   }
00152 
00153   free(basefield);
00154   free(extradims);
00155   free(dimsize);
00156   MtkStringListFree(nfields, &fieldlist);
00157   MtkStringListFree(dimcnt, &dimlist);
00158   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00159 
00160 ERROR_HANDLE:
00161   if (fieldlist != NULL)MtkStringListFree(nfields, &fieldlist);
00162   if (basefield != NULL) free(basefield);
00163   if (extradims != NULL) free(extradims);
00164   if (dimlist != NULL) MtkStringListFree(dimcnt, &dimlist);
00165   if (dimsize != NULL) free(dimsize);
00166   return status_code;
00167 }
